title: Sweet Little Sinners: Books 1-4
description:
It’s a lawless city, filled with mobsters and rogues.

But it’s the girls you should watch out for.


This box set contains the first four books in the Sweet Little Sinners series. Curl up and grab a drink on the rocks for…


Thief

All I did was break into his penthouse… and try to steal a priceless jewel.Now this billionaire’s threatening to keep me.
Hacker

I’ve watched the mobster from afar for years.But he finds out he’s been hacked–and now he’s coming for me.
Honey Trap

The P.I is the one man who knows better than to trust me…And I want him so badly it hurts.
Blade

The first time we meet, I put a knife to his throat.Then he kisses my hand. So I follow him home.
author: Cassie Mint
